item.description:
NOTE- change of location and time.

DESSERT!!!!!!!!

Join us for some amazing dessert at Party Favors Brookline.
Directions: MBTA Green Line to Coolidge Corner, on street parking nearby


This is part of Boston Bakes for Breast Cancer: May 4-10, 2009.

Participating restaurants and bakeries in and around Boston will donate a portion of purchases towards breast cancer research. For every giant cupcake you buy, Party Favors will donate 100% of the proceeds to cancer research.

If you can't make it on the 9th, please consider going to a bakery near you some time during this week! Find a location near you here http://www.bostonbake...
item.name: Buy a cupcake to raise money for breast cancer research!
